name: bromus latiglumis
description: Ear-leaved Brome is a cool season grass; it actively grows during the spring and fall when soil temperatures are cool.This seed is sold as PLS (Pure Live Seed). For example, if you order 1 lb and the PLS is 80%, you receive 1.25 lbs of bulk seed.
features: Deer Resistant (Our experiences here in the Upper Midwest may vary in other regions; deer can respond differently to local conditions or seasonal variations.)
